channel.title: Learning on Angel's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Learning on Angel's Blog

item.title: How I Got Into Programming
item.description: Welcome to my first post. I'm excited that I can share my story with you. In less than a month, I'll be diving headfirst into a intensive web development bootcamp and I plan on taking time out to chronicle my experience. Fear of the unknown - image courtesy of Unsplash I've been dabbling with code for a little over a year and, yes, I do feel that I've learned a lot so far, but there are also some things I feel I'm lacking in, too.
